metadata.bio:
Audrey Mika is a 24 year old singer-songwriter born and raised in California. She also releases music under the name mika archive.

She has a Youtube Channel with over 1M subscribers. She started her Youtube channel on July 30, 2013 but didn't upload until August 17, 2015. On her Instagram account, she has over 500,000 followers. She uploaded her first-ever original song on August 17, 2015 called Paper Jet.
